trans-unit.source: Provides data for the known, but unreferenced, object found in an encoded SOAP XML stream during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 提供已知，但未參考的中找到之物件的已編碼的 SOAP XML 資料流還原序列化期間的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the UnreferencedObjectEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: UnreferencedObjectEventArgs 類別的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject><xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>的事件</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event occurs only when you call the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>發生事件，只有當您呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A unique string used to identify the unreferenced object.
trans-unit.target: 用來識別參考的物件的唯一字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the object.
Use the UnreferencedId property when you need to know when more than one object raises the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要知道當多個物件引發事件時，請使用 UnreferencedId 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property allows you to distinguish between multiple instances of unreferenced objects.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可讓您區分未參考物件的多個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the UnreferencedId property, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event.
trans-unit.target: 如需 UnreferencedId 屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>事件。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>

trans-unit.source: Gets the deserialized, but unreferenced, object.
trans-unit.target: 取得已還原序列化，但未參考的物件。

trans-unit.source: The UnreferencedObject can be cast to the known type if examining its properties is required.
trans-unit.target: UnreferencedObject 可以轉換成已知的型別，如果需要檢查其屬性。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event for more information about the UnreferencedObject property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>UnreferencedObject 屬性的詳細資訊的事件。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>
已還原序列化，但未參考的物件。
